page.title: 15Traffic
page.content: We went onto the grass near my house and we made a list of how many cars went towards Uckfield and how many to Eastbourne. It was a bit hard when there were cars coming both ways. In a quarter of an hour we counted 112 to EASTBOURNE 116 to UCKFIELD 12 lorries 4 dormobiles 1 bus 1 fire engine 1 bus 8 vans 199 cars 3 coaches Sometimes we got confused because the cars whizzed by. We had to sit well back ehind the drain and I was glad because I don't like the road. Sometimes you have to wait a very long time before you can cross. We have a traffic lady to help us over to school. Sometimes it is Tom's mum. They're going to build a new road so the cars won't have to come through our village.
